org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineImageViewer

Class TextWriterImageVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineImageViewer.ImageVisitor
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineImageViewer.TextWriterImageVisitor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelimitedImageVisitor, FileDistributionVisitor, IndentedImageVisitor, LsImageVisitor, NameDistributionVisitor, XmlImageVisitor

    abstract class TextWriterImageVisitor
extends ImageVisitor
    TextWriterImageProcessor mixes in the ability for ImageVisitor implementations to easily write their output to a text file. Implementing classes should be sure to call the super methods for the constructors, finish and finishAbnormally methods, in order that the underlying file may be opened and closed correctly. Note, this class does not add newlines to text written to file or (if enabled) screen. This is the implementing class' responsibility.
